Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Chinese people drinking tea is not only a habit, but also an accumulation of historical and cultural heritage. This culture has lasted for thousands of years.
The Tea Road was once a new international trade route that emerged on the Eurasian continent after the decline of the world-renowned Silk Road. It has promoted the widespread dissemination of traditional Chinese culture, with tea culture as the main body, in Russia and even Europe; Communication and exchange between Chinese civilization and world civilization. Its influence continues to this day.
Undoubtedly, the Tea Road opened the closed doors of ancient empires, leaving behind a precious historical memory for future generations.

Xiamen Kona Tea Co., Ltd., established in 2010, is located in Xiamen, Fujian Province. It is an enterprise mainly engaged in the manufacturing of liquor, beverages, and refined tea
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Tea culture is a type of culture that uses tea as a carrier and aims to reflect the traditional ideology, morality, and humanistic spirit of Eastern countries, including data related to tea etiquette, customs, tea laws, tea regulations, tea techniques, and tea art
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
We have experience with the singularity tool, the relevant commands are as follows

`singularity prep list`
`singularity prep status MyData`
`singularity prep create MyData ~/dataset/folder ~/outDir `
`singularity prep generation-status --dataset MyData <index>`
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, Greater China, North America, South America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
